author: Daniel Greene
description:
Some book opinions are just bad, "make you question reality" bad. In this video, we’re diving into the worst, most misguided takes on books. Whether it’s classic slander, genre gatekeeping, or just plain nonsense, we’re breaking down these horrible book takes and setting the record straight.

What’s the worst book take you’ve ever heard? Drop it in the comments!
